t: Working at Amazon.com in Kansas City, KS: 104 Reviews | Indeed.com
s: I’ve worked at another Amazon in the past and it was a pretty positive experience. The one in KCK, in general, has a pretty toxic and unmotivated pool of employees. I do not recommend.
